EmailTemplate.name: FVF_Campaign_Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Your FVF Campaign has been approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Final_Value_Fee_FVF__c.Requestor__c},
Your Final Value Fee Discount {!Final_Value_Fee_FVF__c.Name} has been Approved.
As a next step seller log into Hive to send the FVF contract to seller.
